extension.category: Validation constraints for the entityrelationship metamodel

constraints.constraint: self.connected->size() <> 0 or self.attributes_composites.attributes->size() <> 0 An attribute must have a connection to an element An attribute must have a connection to an element (Entity, Relationship or Generalization)

(self.entity_connected_to_entity2relationship->size() <> 0) or self.subclass_generalizations->size() <> 0 An entity must have a connection to a relationship or to be a subclass An entity must have a connection to a relationship or to be a subclass
self.attributes->notEmpty() A composite attribute must have a connection to an attribute A composite attribute must have a connection to an attribute

constraint.name: Any entity must have an primary identifier

constraints.constraint: self.connected_with_attribute.connection_attribute.oclAsType(Attribute)->exists (a | a.identifier = TypeIdentifier::PrimaryIdentifier) An entity must have a connection to an primary identifier An entity must have a connection to an primary identifier

constraint.name: Any entity must not have more than one primary identifier

constraints.constraint: self.connected_with_attribute.connection_attribute.oclAsType(Attribute)->select (a | a.identifier = TypeIdentifier::PrimaryIdentifier) ->size() < 2 An entity must not have more than one primary identifier An entity must not have more than one primary identifier

constraint.name: No entity must have empty name

constraints.constraint: self ->forAll(e | not e.name_entity.oclIsUndefined() and e.name_entity <> '') An entity must not have empty name An entity must not have empty name

constraint.name: No attribute must have empty name

constraints.constraint: self ->forAll(e | not e.name_attribute.oclIsUndefined() and e.name_attribute <> '') An attribute must not have empty name An attribute must not have empty name

constraint.name: No relationship must have empty name

constraints.constraint: self ->forAll(e | not e.name_relationship.oclIsUndefined() and e.name_relationship <> '') A relationship must not have empty name A relationship must not have empty name

constraint.name: No entity-relationship connection must have empty role

constraints.constraint: self ->forAll(e | not e.role.oclIsUndefined() and e.role <> '') An entity-relationship connection must not have empty role An entity-relationship connection must not have empty role

constraint.name: No composite attribute must have empty name

constraints.constraint: self ->forAll(e | not e.name_at_composite.oclIsUndefined() and e.name_at_composite <> '') A compsoite attribute must not have empty name A composite attribute must not have empty name

constraint.name: Any weak relationship dependence in identification must have a connection to an dependence in identification attribute

constraints.constraint: if(self.type_relationship =TypeRelationship::Weak_dependence_in_identification)then(self.connected_with_attribute.oclAsType(Connection_With_Attribute)->exists (c | c.type_attribute = TypeAttribute::Dependence_in_identification))else(self.connected_with_attribute.oclAsType(Connection_With_Attribute)->size() = 0 or self.connected_with_attribute.oclAsType(Connection_With_Attribute)->size() <> 0)endif A weak relationship dependence in identification must have a connection to an dependence in identification attribute A weak relationship dependence in identification must have a connection to an dependence in identification attribute

constraint.name: Any weak relationship dependence in identification must have a connection to an dependence attribute

constraints.constraint: if(self.connected.oclAsType(Connection_With_Attribute)->exists (c | c.type_attribute = TypeAttribute::Dependence_in_identification))then(self.attributes_identification->size() <> 0)else(self.attributes_identification->size() = 0)endif A weak relationship dependence in identification must have a connection to an dependence attribute A weak relationship dependence in identification must have a connection to an dependence attribute
Entity.allInstances()->forAll(p1, p2:Entity | p1 <> p2 implies p1.name_entity.toUpper() <> p2.name_entity.toUpper()) Must not be two equal entities There are entities with the same name

Relationship.allInstances()->forAll(p1, p2:Relationship | p1 <> p2 implies p1.name_relationship.toUpper() <> p2.name_relationship.toUpper()) Must not be two equal relationships There are relationships with the same name

Connection_EntityRelationship.allInstances()->forAll(p1, p2:Connection_EntityRelationship | p1 <> p2 implies p1.role.toUpper() <> p2.role.toUpper()) Must not be two equal connections entity-relationship There are connections entity-relationship with the same role

Attribute.allInstances()->forAll(p1, p2:Attribute | p1 <> p2 and p1.connected.element = p2.connected.element implies p1.name_attribute.toUpper() <> p2.name_attribute.toUpper()) Must not be two equal attributes in the same element There are attributes with the same name in the same element

Attribute_Composite.allInstances()->forAll(p1, p2:Attribute_Composite | p1 <> p2 and p1.attributes = p2.attributes implies p1.name_at_composite.toUpper() <> p2.name_at_composite.toUpper()) Must not be two equal composite attributes in the same attribute There are composite attributes with the same name in the same base attribute
